评论详情: Cute but not for folks with wider temples so they fit tighter and cannot be worn for too long otherwise headache ensues. The hinges do not overextended so you're limited to one fit.

类型: Color: BrownSize: One size fits all
评论详情: I was surprised when I received these. They don’t look or feel cheap at all. I have a small head, larger than a child though lol. They fit perfectly and are comfortable across the bridge of my nose. I can see how they COULD be snug for some wearers. I will definitely take care not to sit on these puppies🤙🏻
I like all 3 of these glasses, i liked how they came nicely packaged and they were all very good quality

They block the sun nicely, look chic and don't mess up vision. Comfortable and great value for money. Not expensive, so I don't expect them to last long with regular use. But they are durable enough. The fit is good, nice and snug. But can be adjusted.

Soooo cute! I love them all. They block out light very well whilst simultaneously looking chic and classic! They fit perfect and feel reasonably sturdy.  I love the price point and the fact that it comes with three different styles. Buy them, you won’t regret it! They are the perfect day time accessory.

评论概述: Sunglasses for the Serial Loser (and Breaker)
评论详情: I'm constantly losing or breaking my sunglasses—call it a talent—so I stick with cheapies to keep my wallet and my sanity intact. When I saw this 3-pack, I thought, 'Perfect!' Now I can roll with one pair at a time while the others stay wrapped up and safe in their little cocoons, ready for their moment to shine (or block the shine, I guess).  They're super lightweight, which isn’t a bad thing because heavy glasses have a habit of sliding down my occasionally shiny nose. They do feel a bit delicate, though, so I’m trying to handle them with care—despite my occasional klutziness. We’ll see how long they survive the adventure that is my life.  The fit? Spot on for my face, even though they’re smaller than other styles I’ve tried. The arms are a bit stiff to open and close, but maybe they just need to loosen up.  Overall, a great deal for a 3-pack. If (okay, when) I lose or break one, I’ll still have backups ready to jump into action. Win-win!
Fashionable 90s sunglasses. Sturdy and durable. Comfortable  to wear. Great price for 3 pack.
Good job and blocking sunlight and I like the retro styling. Cant go wrong for the price.

got these to wear when I'm going out and want it to be "glasses in the club" time and they're great! Super cute look, pretty durable (they've made it out with me 4 nights so far!) and I like the variety of colors and prints that you get when you get the 3 pack
I like the shape of these sunglasses; they look nice on my oval shaped face.  Although I did not like that the hinges were all very stiff and you have to apply forceful pressure to fold all the way.

First, I want to say how well these were packaged: even though my dogs got hold of the package and chewed the shipping envelope open, the interior plastic held up and the glasses were carefully packaged in individual plastic sleeves with protectors around the frames. They are perfect for my small face, I love the shape and the colors.

评论概述: These are really nice. I love that there's three.
评论详情: Just a nice little bunch of sunnies. They are small and slightly cat eye, which weirdly favors my face. I love them. Nice that there are multiple ones with different lens shades and colors.

I recently got a 3 pairs of retro oval sunglasses for women, and they definitely give me that cool vibe reminiscent of The Matrix. While they might not offer much eye protection from bright sunlight, they are super cute and perfect for photos and fashion shows. Overall, a stylish accessory!

评论概述: Nice sunglasses, but too small for me.
评论详情: I really liked these sunglasses but unfortunately they don’t fit my face because they are too small.

My daughter ordered up a couple of things and included this in her haul:  She liked this set of 3 pairs of sunglasses.  She liked the oval design and she said they looked good on her face.  They are of decent quality, especially at the cheap cost.  Overall, good find.
Uv protection and stylish? Yes please!

评论概述: Cute design and style, light weight
评论详情: Cute 3 pack of glasses, moderate tint. Very trendy and light weight. Great value for the price. Super cute and comfortable. Only con is they feel a little fragile not sure if they will last.
They come in a pack of 3. The glasses are a bit flemsy, and thin but work okay. I don’t know if you would like to wear them every day or just for a event to complete your look.
